title: Calories in a Pepsi
meta_description: Discover calories in a pepsi (12 oz can), including carbs, sugars, sodium, and quick tweaks for diet versions or sizes.
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) can of original Pepsi cola, regular sugar version, no added flavors or modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, exact formulation, serving size, and regional differences. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard 12 oz can of Pepsi contains 150 kcal, mostly from 41 g of sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: 20 oz bottle instead of 12 oz can

faqs.q: How many calories in a pepsi can?
faqs.a: About 150 kcal in a standard 12 oz can of regular Pepsi.

faqs.q: Does Pepsi have sugar or carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, 41 g sugars and 41 g total carbs per 12 oz can, with 0 g fiber.
Diet Pepsi has 0 kcal per 12 oz can, using artificial sweeteners.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a Pepsi?
faqs.a: Around 35 mg sodium per 12 oz can.
No, a 12 oz can has about 38 mg caffeine; check labels for exact amounts.
